benchmark_details.name: CoLoTa (Commonsense reasoning over Long-Tail entities)
benchmark_details.overview: CoLoTa is a dataset consisting of 3,300 queries for commonsense reasoning over long-tail entities, aimed at evaluating both LLM commonsense reasoning capabilities and KGQA methods.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the entity-based commonsense reasoning capabilities of LLMs in long-tail settings and improve KGQA methodologies.

data.source: Queries formulated from existing entity-based commonsense reasoning datasets, specifically StrategyQA and CREAK.
data.annotation: Annotated with reasoning steps and knowledge graph facts.

methodology.calculation: FActScore measures the percentage of atomic facts supported by a knowledge source. Reasoning Score assesses the validity of logical reasoning in the LLM responses.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in commonsense reasoning and factual accuracy.
methodology.validation: Queries validated for factual knowledge supported by Wikidata.
